submitStage.description:
Enum representing the various stages of a transaction's lifecycle.

 - STAGE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified stage.
 - STAGE_ACKNOWLEDGED: Transaction has been acknowledged by the node.
 - STAGE_MEMPOOL: Transaction is in the mempool.
 - STAGE_NETWORK: Transaction has been propagated across the network.
 - STAGE_CONFIRMED: Transaction has been confirmed on the blockchain.
